title: pbe
body: PBE account please I want to help you commence purchases in North America as soon as I opened LV 5 but I wanted to be a good day I would ask riot to please

replies.body:
You can apply for PBE access from [this page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) if you'd like access. 

We select PBE testers based on varying criteria that change all the time. I strongly recommend checking out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for complete details. Let me know if you have any questions.
